A good upload. Much appriciated. Especially for the YNQ albums. But unfortunatly I feel that I must point out that the following albums are incomplete:

Jaylib - Are Jaylib
Madlib - Remixes
Madvillian - Madvilliany (Madlib's Pre-Release Mix)
Madvillian - Madvilliany Koushik Remixes EP
VA - Stones Throw 101
VA - Peanut Butter Wolf's Jukebox 45's
YNQ - Angles Without Edges (intro only tough!)

Many thanks still. Just felt I had to let others now. And remember if you like what you hear. Go buy an album everynow and then since labels like Stones Throw deserves the support. Not many labels putting out as good and versatile music as Stones Throw. One love.

You can use MusicBrainz Picard, to rename ID3 tags, and I think you can have it place mp3s in files relating to it's album name.

Anyway, great program for organizing MP3s...
Oh, one more thing, MusicBrainz Picard is free, as in Beer and Freedom....

You know what, EasyTag is easier to use for just album naming.  But you can use Picard for a great ID23 tagger.


http://easytag.sourceforge.net/

Discussion on how to use for folder naming purpose:

http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=433445
      Search that page for post: "It's works in several stages."
